template.name: Fortigate 100D
template.description:
## Overview
Customized Template based on the original made by Leonardo Nascimento da Silva. Added LLD for Hostname, CPU, Memory and Serial Number.
Also added HA Status and basic SNMP info (Contact, Name, Uptime).
Tested with Fortigate 100D on Zabbix 3.4.6
BTW, I had to create some Value Mappings as follows:
Fortigate HA Auto Sync
1 > Disabled
2 > Enabled
Fortigate HA Status
1 > Standalone
2 > Active/Active
3 > Active/Passive
######################################
Template customizado baseado no original do Leonardo Nascimento da Silva. Adicionei LLD's para o Hostname, CPU, Memória e Número de Série das unidades (quando estiverem em HA).
Também adicionei o status do HA e informações básicas do SNMP (Nome, Uptime, Contato)
Testei com o Fortigate 100D no Zabbix 3.4.6
Inclusive, eu tive que criar alguns mapeamentos de valores:
Fortigate HA Auto Sync
1 > Desativado
2 > Ativado
Fortigate HA Status
1 > Sem HA
2 > Ativo/Ativo
3 > Ativo/Passivo
Cheers!
Luiz Fernando Gondin Santos
## Author
Luiz Fernando Gondin Santos

item.name: Contact person
item.description: The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person.

item.name: System description
item.description: A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Physical Location of the device
item.description: The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor').

discovery_rule.name: Enclosures
discovery_rule.description: A number that uniquely specifies this enclosure in the rack.

item_prototype.name: Condition of Enclosure #$1
item_prototype.description: The overall condition of the enclosure. This is the aggregate of the temperature sensors, fans, and fuses within the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Firmware Revision of Enclosure #$1
item_prototype.description: The firmware revision of the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Model of Enclosure #$1
item_prototype.description: The model name of the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Name of Enclosure #$1
item_prototype.description: The name of the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Part Number of Enclosure #$1
item_prototype.description: The part number of the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Serial Number of Enclosure #$1
item_prototype.description: The serial number of the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Spare Part Number of Enclosure #$1
item_prototype.description: The spare part number of the enclosure.

discovery_rule.name: Enclosure Managers
discovery_rule.description: This specifies if the manager described is present in the system.

item_prototype.name: Condition of Enclosure Manager #$1
item_prototype.description: The condition of the manager.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of Enclosure Manager #{#SNMPINDEX} is degraded
Status of Enclosure Manager #{#SNMPINDEX} is failed

item_prototype.name: Part Number of Enclosure Manager #$1
item_prototype.description: The part number of the enclosure manager.

item_prototype.name: Enclosure Manager #$1 Existing
item_prototype.description: This specifies if the manager described is present in the system.

item_prototype.name: Role of Enclosure Manager #$1
item_prototype.description: This specifies the current role of the manager.

item_prototype.name: Serial Number of Enclosure Manager #$1
item_prototype.description: The serial number of the enclosure manager.

item_prototype.name: Spare Part Number of Enclosure Manager #$1
item_prototype.description: The spare part number of the enclosure manager.

discovery_rule.name: FANs
discovery_rule.description: A number that uniquely specifies this rack.

item_prototype.name: Fan #$1 Status
item_prototype.description: The condition of the fan.

item_prototype.name: Part number of Fan #$1
item_prototype.description: The part number of the enclosure fan.

item_prototype.name: Fan #$1 Existing
item_prototype.description: This specifies if the fan described is present in the system.

item_prototype.name: Spare Part Number for Fan #$1
item_prototype.description: The spare part number of the enclosure fan.

item_prototype.name: Incoming traffic on {#SNMPVALUE} port
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifInOctets.

item_prototype.name: Outgoing traffic on {#SNMPVALUE} port
item_prototype.description: The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifOutOctets.

item_prototype.name: Speed of {#SNMPVALUE} port
item_prototype.description: An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth.

discovery_rule.name: Network Connectors
discovery_rule.description: This specifies if the network connector described is present in the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Device Type of Network Connector #$1
item_prototype.description: The type of interrconnect in the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Location of Network Connector #$1
item_prototype.description: The location of the network connector within the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Model of Network Connector #$1
item_prototype.description: The model name of the network connector.

item_prototype.name: Part Number of Network Connector #$1
item_prototype.description: The part number of the network connector.

item_prototype.name: Network Connector #$1 Existing
item_prototype.description: This specifies if the network connector described is present in the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Serial Number of Network Connector #$1
item_prototype.description: The serial number of the network connector.

item_prototype.name: Spare Part Number of Network Connector #$1
item_prototype.description: The spare part number of the network connector.

discovery_rule.name: Power Supplies
discovery_rule.description: A number that uniquely specifies this power supply in the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Condition of Power Supply #$1
item_prototype.description: The condition of the power supply.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of Power Supply #{#SNMPINDEX} is degraded
Status of Power Supply #{#SNMPINDEX} is failed

item_prototype.name: Current power output for Power Supply #$1
item_prototype.description: The current power output of the power supply in watts.

item_prototype.name: Input line status of Power Supply #$1
item_prototype.description: The status of line input power.

valuemap.name: HP - Power Supply Input Power Status

trigger_prototype.name: Input line power of Power Supply #{#SNMPINDEX} has problems [{ITEM.LASTVALUE1}]

item_prototype.name: Max power output for Power Supply #$1
item_prototype.description: The maximum power output of the power supply in watts.

item_prototype.name: Part Number for Power Supply #$1
item_prototype.description: The part number of the power supply.

item_prototype.name: Power Supply #$1 Existing
item_prototype.description: This specifies if the power supply described is present in the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Serial Number for Power Supply #$1
item_prototype.description: The serial number of the power supply.

item_prototype.name: Spare Part Number for Power Supply #$1
item_prototype.description: The spare part number of the power supply.

item_prototype.name: Power Supply #$1 Status
item_prototype.description: The status of the power supply.

trigger_prototype.name: Power Supply #{#SNMPINDEX} is overloaded more than 90% [{ITEM.LASTVALUE1}]

discovery_rule.name: Rack Server Blades
discovery_rule.description: This specifies if the server blade described is present in the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Fault Diagnostic Information of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The server blade fault diagnostic string. This will contain a probable cause and potential diagnostic action to be taken to remedy the fault condition.

item_prototype.name: Fault Major of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The major fault code of the blade fault reported by the enclosure manager.

item_prototype.name: Fault Minor of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The minor fault code of the blade fault reported by the enclosure manager.

item_prototype.name: Name of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The name of the server blade.

trigger_prototype.name: Name of Blade Server #{#SNMPINDEX} has been changed

item_prototype.name: Part number of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The part number of the server blade.

item_prototype.name: Position of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The position or slot number of the server blade within the server enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Powered of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description:
The power state of the blade.
This will be other(1) if the rack does not report the information or if it could not be determined.

item_prototype.name: Present of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: This specifies if the server blade described is present in the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Product ID of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The product id string of the server blade.

item_prototype.name: Serial number of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The serial number of the server blade.

item_prototype.name: Spare Part Number of Blade server #$1
item_prototype.description: The spare part number of the server blade.

item_prototype.name: Blade server #$1 Status
item_prototype.description: The health status of the blade.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of Blade Server #{#SNMPINDEX} is degraded
Status of Blade Server #{#SNMPINDEX} is failed

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Sensors
discovery_rule.description: The location description of the temperature sensor within the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Condition of #$1 sensor ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: The Temperature sensor condition.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of Temp sensor #{#SNMPINDEX} is degraded

item_prototype.name: Current temperature on #$1 sensor ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: This is the current temperature sensor reading in degrees celsius.

item_prototype.name: Temperature sensor #$1 location
item_prototype.description: The location description of the temperature sensor within the enclosure.

item_prototype.name: Threshold of #$1 sensor ({#SNMPVALUE})
item_prototype.description: This is the threshold temperature sensor setting in degrees celsius.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of Temp sensor #{#SNMPINDEX} is failed [{ITEM.LASTVALUE2}]

value_map.name: HP - Power Supply Input Power Status
